title: Bug 117981 - Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description: Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view. Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the library outline view. 2. Attempt to select any item for the first time.
OB: The selected item does not respond or get highlighted on the first attempt.
EB: The item should be selectable on the initial attempt in the library outline view.
SR: 1. Open the library outline view. 2. Try to select any item. Note the lack of response or highlighting on the first attempt.
